title.rendered: Credit Distress Brings Opportunity for Patient Capital

content.rendered: The impact of the pandemic has been extraordinary, and the ongoing human cost has been tragic. Our thoughts go out to those who are suffering, and we are grateful to the medical staff who are on the front lines fighting the virus and its spread. We have never faced a complete shutdown of economies globally, and the impact has been profound.

excerpt.rendered: The impact of the pandemic has been extraordinary, and the ongoing human cost has been tragic. Our thoughts go out to those who are suffering, and we are grateful to the medical staff who are on the front lines fighting the virus and its spread. We have never faced a complete shutdown of economies globally, and the impact has been profound.
